import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate,Link}from'react-router-dom';import{toast}from'react-toastify';import'./Login.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[email,setEmail]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const[showPassword,setShowPassword]=useState(false);// üëà Toggle state
const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogin=async()=>{try{const res=await fetch('https://mern-todo-app-test-1.onrender.com/api/auth/login',{method:'POST',headers:{'Content-Type':'application/json'},body:JSON.stringify({email,password})});const data=await res.json();if(!res.ok)throw new Error(data.message||'Login failed');localStorage.setItem('token',data.token);navigate('/todos',{replace:true});}catch(err){console.error(err);toast.error(err.message||'Login failed');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"login-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"login-title",children:"\uD83D\uDD10 Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"email",className:"login-input",placeholder:"Email",value:email,onChange:e=>setEmail(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:showPassword?'text':'password',className:"login-input",placeholder:"Password",value:password,onChange:e=>setPassword(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("label",{className:"show-password",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"checkbox",checked:showPassword,onChange:()=>setShowPassword(!showPassword)}),"Show Password"]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"login-button",onClick:handleLogin,children:"Login"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"login-switch",children:["Don't have an account? ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/signup",children:"Sign up"})]})]});};export default Login;
